Package model.sensor

Class Sensor

java.lang.Object
model.sensor.Sensor
Direct Known Subclasses:
CarbonMonoxideSensor, EntrySensor, GlassSensor, MotionSensor, SmokeSensor, TemperatureSensor, WaterSensor
public abstract class Sensor
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract epresentation of a sensor.
Author:
Blake Hamilton

    • trigger

      Triggers the sensor.

    • detect

      public abstract java.lang.String detect()
      Detects sensor related threat. Since we do not have access to the physical component, it is implied that when this method is called the sensor has sensed its relative threat.
      Returns:
      The result of the detect method.
